summary: Quick team check-in: everyone reported they are doing well and ready to work. QA is ready to run tests/review changes, PM is ready to help/prioritize, Developer is awaiting assignment to start development, and Architect (Mike) is ready to work on architecture and design.

actions.task: Run tests and/or review changes when available
Start development work once assigned (awaiting task assignment)
Define focus/prioritize tasks and assign work to the team
Begin architecture and design work as required

backlog_deltas.title: Create task for QA: run tests and review current changes
Create task for Developer: assign initial development work
Create task for PM: define priorities and assign owners

risks.risk: No explicit task assignments or priorities were made during the check-in, which may cause delays or idle time.
risks.mitigation: PM should assign clear tasks and priorities with owners and due dates.

risks.risk: No deadlines or timelines were established, increasing the chance of scope drift.
risks.mitigation: Set due dates for actions and backlog items and communicate expectations to the team.
